mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (mnctg, mnname, mnengname, mninfo, mnimg, mnprice) VALUES (#{mnctg}, #{mnname}, #{mnengname}, #{mninfo}, #{mnimg}, #{mnprice})

INSERT INTO menuspec (mncode, mngram, mnkcal, mnprotein, mnfat, mnsugar, mnnatrum) VALUES ((SELECT mncode FROM menu ORDER BY mncode DESC LIMIT 1), #{mngram}, #{mnkcal}, #{mnprotein}, #{mnfat}, #{mnsugar}, #{mnnatrum})
